com.alvermont.terraj.stargen
Class Generator

java.lang.Object
  com.alvermont.terraj.stargen.Generator

public class Generator
extends java.lang.Object

Handles the top level planetary system generation

Generate and return a new star

Returns:

generateStellarSystem

public void generateStellarSystem(Primary sun,
                                  Planet seedSystem,
                                  double outerPlanetLimit,
                                  double dustDensityCoeff)
Generate a stellar system based around a particular star and possibily using some planetary bodies as seed values.

Parameters:
sun - The star to form planets around
seedSystem - Points to the first record in a list to form the basis of the system. Set this to null to generate all planets from scratch.
outerPlanetLimit - The outermost planetary range in AU
dustDensityCoeff - The coefficient for dust density

initPlanet

protected void initPlanet(Planet planet)
Initialize a planet record

Parameters:
planet - The planet record to be initialized

initPlanetOrbitVelocityRadius

protected void initPlanetOrbitVelocityRadius(Primary sun,
                                             Planet planet,
                                             boolean randomTilt)
Initialize the planetary orbital velocity and radius. Also calculates the exospheric temperature of the planet. On return the corresponding values will be valid in the planet record.

Parameters:
sun - The star for the solar system
planet - The planet to be calculated for
randomTilt - If 
true
then the planet is to be given a random orbital tilt

initPlanetDensityGravity

protected void initPlanetDensityGravity(Primary sun,
                                        Planet planet)
Initialize the planetary density and gravity. On return the corresponding values will be valid in the planet record.

Parameters:
sun - The star for the solar system
planet - The planet to be calculated for

initPlanetDayVelocity

protected void initPlanetDayVelocity(Planet planet)
Initialize the planetary day length and escape velocity. On return the corresponding values will be valid in the planet record.

Parameters:
planet - The planet to be calculated for

initPlanetGasGiant

protected void initPlanetGasGiant(Planet planet)
Initialize gas giant and atmospheric related parameters for a planet. On return the corresponding values will be valid for the planet record.

Parameters:
planet - The planet to calculate for

initPlanetGravityPressureTemp

protected void initPlanetGravityPressureTemp(Primary sun,
                                             Planet planet)
Initialize the planetary surface gravity, pressures and temperatures. On return the corresponding values will be valid in the planet record

Parameters:
sun - The star for the solar system
planet - The planet to be calculated for

                                    Planet planet)
Initialize the atmosphere for a planet. On return the corresponding values will be valid in the planet record

Parameters:

initPlanetType

protected void initPlanetType(Planet planet)
Initialize the type of a planet. On return the corresponding value will be valid in the planet record.

Parameters:
planet - The planet to set the type for

generateMoonsForPlanet

public void generateMoonsForPlanet(Primary sun,
                                   Planet planet)
Generate moons for a planet. On return the corresponding value in the planet record will be set to a valid value. Note: This feature is marked as experimental in the original C source code.

Parameters:
sun - The star for this solar system
planet - The planet to generate moons for

generate

public void generate(Primary sun,
                     Planet seedSystem,
                     double outerPlanetLimit,
                     double dustCoefficient,
                     boolean randomTilt,
                     int systemNumber,
                     java.lang.String systemName)
Generate a stellar system based around a particular star and possibily using some planetary bodies as seed values.

Parameters:
sun - The star to form planets around
seedSystem - Points to the first record in a list to form the basis of the system. Set this to null to generate all planets from scratch.
outerPlanetLimit - The outermost planetary range in AU
dustCoefficient - The coefficient for dust density
randomTilt - If 
true
then give the planets a random tilt
systemNumber - The number of the star system (not currently used)
systemName - The name of the star system

generate

public void generate(Primary sun,
                     int systemNumber,
                     java.lang.String systemName)
Generate a stellar system using a simplified set of calling parameters

Parameters:
sun - The star to form planets around
systemNumber - The number of the star system (not currently used)
systemName - The name of the star system
